entry.description: Configurable products with DailyDeal active have it's price fixed for all variants (simple products represented by swatches). Therefore clicking on swatch should not trigger price update event nor special-price class toggle, as this should be always on. Logic of toggling special-price class is somehow doubled therefore the same fix has to be applied here and in theme-creativeshop where _UpdatePrice method has been extended with updatePriceLabel method.
